channel.title: Is this report worthy?
channel.description:
I was playing a lot of TOL lately and was enjoying myself doing so. But i came across a couple of games where i was reported for my actions. I want to know if i can be reported for what i did.
In one of my games i was Hunter and jailed on N5. Then i was executed by the Prince due to not wolfing anyone. Afterwords i was then reportable by Prince and a couple of other players in the game because they said "I did not prove myself as a provable class"
In another game i was playing as a phys. There was an outed alch so i whispered him saying to heal me if i heal him. We were good for a couple of nights and then during the day i was put on trail by the court. They wanted to execute me because they didn't believe that a phys would heal an alch. I was then executed and the Alch i was healing was the person pushing for me to be executed. Afterwords they said to report me because i was healing an alch and not BD members(The alch also reported me). More than half of the people in the game then reported me to my knowledge
Should i have been reported for what i did.

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Dw I get called a “Retard” and that I need reporting for any mistake even when it isn’t even close to reportable and players who spam report and all that are normally bad players themselves that don’t even know what throwing is in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
Don’t worry, Hunter is 100% not reportable.

NOBLE1:

I was then executed and the Alch i was healing was the person pushing for me to be executed. Afterwords they said to report me because i was healing an alch and not BD members(The alch also reported me).

This isn’t too much a good play, but is worth buying time and favour of Alch.
I don’t see the problem here.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?

item.description:
NOBLE1:

TOS

The crossover nobody asked.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Sharvax
item.description:
tbh, the ones reporting you should be punished for false reporting.

Nothing you did was reportable. They cannot tell you how to play your class. Forcing someone to play by a “meta” is stupid. There CAN be cases made for intentionally playing badly, but its EXTREMELY hard to prove, however, I dont even think you played badly.

Its like saying “Report the prince who exed you for exeing a bd with no proof” - Absolutely stupid lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Definition of gamethrowing: “Trying to lose” or alternatively “Trying to against your win condition”.

Your actions are irrelevant. What matters is your intent which is very clearly to win (successful or otherwise)

Remember it is possible to gamethrow by accusing and executing the Mastermind as Blue Dragon at a time that benefits your faction

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Captain
item.description:
This is not even reportable or punishable and they assumed a class can be proven.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
NOBLE1:

I was playing a lot of TOS lately and was enjoying myself doing so.

…how dare you.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?

item.description:
if this was report worthy 1/4 of TOL community would be banned

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Biperspectival
item.description:
In general, unless an authority tells you, I wouldn’t worry about it. Most ToL players are kinda report happy, so unless you get a notif don’t sweat it

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
Its a bad choice but it was for two nights. Wanted to save my self heals for late game.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
i should of mentioned it was an Unseen game and no one was poisoned at the time

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
No and no, although arguably the second scenario is one of the worst choices you could have made lol

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Nesnah
item.description:
For the hunter game: No, you arent obligated to prove yourself immediately. It is usually good to do so but is not required. Its also sometimes good to save wolves.
For the phys game: No, unless BD were poisoned or had important targets that the alch was not healing. Because then you are intentionally not helping your team and letting them die. That is a case for gamethrowing but its probably not enough to warrant any punishment.

In short, you’re fine. Don’t worry.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this report worthy?
item.dc:creator: Kape
item.description:
No and you will not be punished for that.

Read full topic
